body_html: After about literally an hour of dependency hell, I managed to find all the .debs I needed for command-line-tools for Ubuntu 16.04 compatible with cuda 9.2 on this page. (i.e., without having to downgrade to cuda 9.0 or cuda 9.1). Similar to @max0x 's solution, I guess.
body_text: After about literally an hour of dependency hell, I managed to find all the .debs I needed for command-line-tools  for Ubuntu 16.04 compatible with cuda 9.2 on this page. (i.e., without having to downgrade to cuda 9.0 or cuda 9.1). Similar to @max0x 's solution, I guess.
body: After about literally an hour of dependency hell, I managed to find all the `.deb`s I needed for `command-line-tools`  for Ubuntu 16.04 compatible with **`cuda 9.2`** on [this page.](https://developer.download.nvidia.com/compute/cuda/repos/ubuntu1604/x86_64/) (i.e., without having to downgrade to `cuda 9.0` or `cuda 9.1`). Similar to @max0x 's solution, I guess.
